div.p: AT THAT RATE, IT WILL TAKE
GET THE SHIP OUT OF HERE.
WHAT WE SEE ON THIS TAPE
A LIFE FORM SUCH AS HERS
AND IF I KNOW CAPTAIN KIRK,
I AM UNABLE TO LOCK IN
WHAT HAVE THEY DONE TO YOU?
I MIGHT BE ABLE TO CAUSE
AND GET US OUT OF HERE
SPOCK, IT WON'T BE TOO LONG
WILL BE ABLE TO DO SO.
I'LL TELL YOU WHAT YOU NEED
I WAS CONVINCED IN THE SAME
I SHALL ATTEMPT TO DO SO.
I AM, OF COURSE, MOST FAMILIAR
BY THE DEATH OF OUR FRIEND
THAT IS WHY WE ARE HERE.
I CAN'T. NOW, YOU KNOW THAT.
I CAN'T LET YOU DO IT.
